tweet.text: RT @StateDept: "Barbara Bush represented the best of our country to the world, from our embassy in China to @WhiteHouse as First Lady. We'r…
tweet.html: RT @StateDept: "Barbara Bush represented the best of our country to the world, from our embassy in China to @WhiteHouse as First Lady. We're grateful for her legacy of public service, volunteerism & family. We offer deepest condolences & thoughts & prayers to her loved ones." -- @statedeptspox pic.twitter.com/VcgJ2oVwhb
